It might be a way to make simulations more popular, but I am not sure if the term â€˜democratizationâ€™ is the right word. As far as I remember the economic status should not matter in a real democracy, but it does matter in the proposed type of democratization. It is very likely that more engineers would use simulations if they werenâ€™t that expensive.
